full_text: OFFICE OF THE STATE ATTORNEY FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT OF FLORIDA IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY BARRY E. KRISCHER STATE ATTORNEY July 13, 2006 GRAND JURY TO: DET JOSEPH RECAREY #7915 PALM BEACH POLICE DEPARTMENT 345 S. COUNTY ROAD PALM BEACH, FL 33480 FAX: 835-4736 Re: Your Case No. 05-0368 Dear Det Recarey: The above-styled case has been set before the Palm Beach County Grand Jury for investigation on 07/19/2006, at 9:00 AM, in Room 4A, Juvenile Courts Building of the Palm Beach County Courthouse, 205 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida. Please call our office upon receipt of this notice at 355-7363 (Bobbie Payne). This NOTICE TO APPEAR is being sent to you in lieu of a Grand Jury Subpoena. We expect you to honor this Notice since, as a police officer, you are integrally involved in the prosecution of the above-styled defendant. Again, you are cautioned that this NOTICE TO APPEAR is being treated by our Office as a Grand Jury Subpoena and requires your cooperation in order to conduct a successful prosecution. Sincerely, LANNA BELOHLAVEK Assistant State Attorney Florida Bar No. 0776726 xc: Official Court File State Attorney's Work File 401 N. Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida 33401-4209 (561) 355-7100 07/26/17 Page 118 of 124 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031839

text_blocks.content: OFFICE OF THE STATE ATTORNEY FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT OF FLORIDA IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY
TO: DET JOSEPH RECAREY #7915 PALM BEACH POLICE DEPARTMENT 345 S. COUNTY ROAD PALM BEACH, FL 33480 FAX: 835-4736

The above-styled case has been set before the Palm Beach County Grand Jury for investigation on 07/19/2006, at 9:00 AM, in Room 4A, Juvenile Courts Building of the Palm Beach County Courthouse, 205 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida.
Please call our office upon receipt of this notice at 355-7363 (Bobbie Payne).

This NOTICE TO APPEAR is being sent to you in lieu of a Grand Jury Subpoena. We expect you to honor this Notice since, as a police officer, you are integrally involved in the prosecution of the above-styled defendant. Again, you are cautioned that this NOTICE TO APPEAR is being treated by our Office as a Grand Jury Subpoena and requires your cooperation in order to conduct a successful prosecution.
Assistant State Attorney Florida Bar No. 0776726

additional_notes: The document is a notice to appear sent by the Office of the State Attorney to Detective Joseph Recarey. It is dated July 13, 2006, and relates to a case set before the Palm Beach County Grand Jury. The document is stamped and has handwritten signature.
